entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is the one who kicked out Pettigrew and was addressed by Lupin as 'Padfoot'. He is described as having a gaunt face.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Pettigrew recoiled after being kicked out by Black and was addressed by Lupin as 'Remus'.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is the one who was addressed by Pettigrew as 'Remus' and by Black as 'Padfoot'. He rolled up his sleeves to help Black.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who would not have told Lupin that he was the spy, and whose plan had been changed.

relationships.description: Lupin believed Sirius to be the spy, as mentioned by Pettigrew.
Black and Lupin are old friends, as referred to in their conversation.
